## Summary

Describe the change and why it is needed.

## Testing

List the checks you ran.

## Definition of Done

- [ ] Changes are scoped to a small, focused set of files.
- [ ] Tests updated/added for behavior changes.
- [ ] Documentation updated for public API or workflow changes.
- [ ] `ruff`, `mypy`, and `pytest` run locally (or justified why not).
- [ ] No secrets or credentials added.
- [ ] Conventional Commit message used.
